mapper.sql: car_id, park_id, park_type, user_id, user_name, gmt_start, gmt_end, car_delete_mark
mapper.select: select * from car_msg carMsg left join park_information parkInfo on carMsg.park_id = parkInfo.park_id left join fix_user fixUser on carMsg.user_id = fixUser.user_id where carMsg.car_delete_mark = '0' and parkInfo.park_delete_mark = '0' and fixUser.user_delete_mark = '0' and parkInfo.park_type = 'fix' and parkInfo.park_status = '1'

select * from car_msg carMsg right join (select * from fix_user where user_name = #{userName,jdbcType=VARCHAR} and user_delete_mark = '0')fixUser on carMsg.user_id = fixUser.user_id left join park_information parkInfo on carMsg.park_id = parkInfo.park_id where carMsg.car_delete_mark = '0' and parkInfo.park_delete_mark = '0'
